mapper.sql: ID, OddsID, upOdds, Goal, downOdds, ModifyTime, isEarly
mapper.select: SELECT l.oddsid,ld.* from letgoal l LEFT JOIN letgoaldetail ld on l.OddsID = ld.OddsID where l.ScheduleID = #{id} and l.CompanyID = #{cpy} order by ld.ModifyTime desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into letgoaldetail (ID, OddsID, upOdds, Goal, downOdds, ModifyTime, isEarly) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into letgoaldetail
ID,
OddsID,
upOdds,
Goal,
downOdds,
ModifyTime,
isEarly,

mapper.update:
update letgoaldetail
OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
upOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL},
Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL},
downOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isEarly = #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update letgoaldetail set OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, upOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, downOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isEarly = #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
